data.title: Emilia Fox
data.text:
Born: 31-Jul-1974

Birthplace: London, England

Gender: Female

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Actor

Nationality: England

Executive summary: Nikki Alexander on Silent Witness

Father: Edward Fox (actor, b. 13-Apr-1937)

Mother: Joanna David (actress, b. 17-Jan-1947)

Boyfriend: Orlando Wells (actor, ex-)

Boyfriend: Vic Reeves (comic, dated in 2000, broken engagement)

Husband: Jared Harris (actor, m. 16-Jul-2005)

High School: Bryanston School

University: Oxford University

Risk Factors: Former Smoker

TELEVISION

Merlin Morgause (2009-)

Silent Witness Nikki Alexander (2004-)
